title: Why they ban rammus at ESL?
body: Hey i saw some rammus bans yesterday at ESL on preseason patch, i wonder does anybody know why they baning in?

replies.body: caus its an ad meta and rammus shits on ad based champs

The new thornmail works really well on him too so he can kill ap champions with his taunt, ult, sheild combo.

And (not to be underestimated) he does really well with the free homeguards.

ad is the meta rammus hard counters everything about ad meta's
a while back when ad assasins ran rampant he was nerfed too so expect to see another stupid nerf done to the poor armadillo.
So any other ideas why is rammus baned?
Couldn't say exactly why teams are banning him specifically. He could counter a strategy they are trying to do or something but I do know that he is good in soloq right now if you want to try em.
